ISSUE.TITLE: Bundling minification on linux
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: nopcommerceteam/nopcommerce:4.2 Steps to reproduce the problem: Enable docker 'JavaScript bundling and minification' and 'CSS bundling and minification'. The Bundling minification feature not support linux. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13699353/67917673-b16f2300-fbd4-11e9-880e-4354bfba4460.png) The bundles file not create at '/app/wwwroot/bundles', create at root directory.The bundle file is empty. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13699353/67917805-26daf380-fbd5-11e9-9ad4-f639f142e56d.png)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4135 bundle minification using AbsolutePath for cross platform (#4136)
